actor_awards.notes: A legendary stage actress known for her husky voice, wit, and flamboyant personality. While her filmography is relatively short compared to her stage career, she delivered a powerhouse performance in Alfred Hitchcock's 'Lifeboat', winning the New York Film Critics Circle Award for Best Actress.

filmography.title: Lifeboat
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated, cynical fashion journalist who becomes the de facto leader of a group of survivors in a lifeboat during WWII.
filmography.plot: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat men who sank it.
filmography.awards: New York Film Critics Circle: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: Die! Die! My Darling!
filmography.role_description: A fanatical, religious mother who holds her deceased son's fiancée captive.
filmography.plot: A young woman visits the mother of her dead fiancé to pay her respects, but the older woman turns out to be a religious fanatic who imprisons her.

filmography.title: A Royal Scandal
filmography.role_description: The Empress of Russia who falls for a dashing young officer plotting a revolution.
filmography.plot: A young officer plots a revolution against Catherine the Great but ends up winning her favor and becoming her lover instead.

filmography.title: Devil and the Deep
filmography.role_description: The wife of a jealous submarine commander who falls in love with his lieutenant.
filmography.plot: A naval commander's jealousy over his wife drives him to madness and endangers his ship and crew.

filmography.title: Faithless
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who loses her fortune in the Depression and is forced into desperate measures to survive.
filmography.plot: A spoiled rich girl loses her money in the Depression and refuses to marry her beau until he can support her properly, leading to a downward spiral.

filmography.title: Tarnished Lady
filmography.role_description: A once-wealthy woman who marries for money but finds she cannot live without love.
filmography.plot: A socialite marries a stockbroker for his money to maintain her lifestyle but eventually realizes the emptiness of her choice.

filmography.title: The Cheat
filmography.role_description: A compulsive gambler who becomes indebted to a wealthy art collector with sinister intentions.
filmography.plot: A woman loses a large sum of charity money gambling and borrows from a rich man who demands she repay him with her affection.

filmography.title: My Sin
filmography.role_description: A woman with a scandalous past in Panama who tries to start a new life in New York.
filmography.plot: A cabaret singer in Panama shoots her husband and flees to New York to reinvent herself as an interior decorator.

filmography.title: Thunder Below
filmography.role_description: A woman living in Central America who falls in love with her husband's best friend.
filmography.plot: The wife of an oil geologist in the tropics struggles with her love for her husband's best friend.

filmography.title: Stage Door Canteen
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, entertaining troops during World War II.
filmography.plot: A musical revue featuring various stars of stage and screen entertaining American soldiers at the famous canteen.

filmography.title: Main Street to Broadway
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, giving advice to a young playwright.
filmography.plot: A young playwright tries to make it big on Broadway, interacting with various famous theater personalities along the way.

filmography.title: The Daydreamer
filmography.role_description: The voice of the Sea Witch in the animated segment 'The Little Mermaid'.
filmography.plot: A young Hans Christian Andersen learns life lessons from the characters in the stories he will one day write.

filmography.title: Make Me a Star
filmography.plot: A grocery clerk travels to Hollywood to become a star and encounters various celebrities on the studio lot.

filmography.title: Who Loved Him Best?
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in one of her very first silent films.
filmography.plot: A silent drama about a sculptor and the two women who love him.

filmography.title: The Trap
filmography.role_description: A role in an early silent film drama.
filmography.plot: A woman seeks revenge on the man who ruined her father, only to find herself caught in a trap of her own making.

filmography.title: When Men Betray
filmography.plot: A drama about the consequences of betrayal and moral corruption.
